channel.title: Can't talk?
channel.description: Alright so finally got the client working - sort of, we found the old src files and it runs smoothly on localhost and everything. There's just this one small problem... When a player types anything and presses enter, the client nulls itself. Making it impossible to test stuff like commands etc. Is there a quick fix for this stuff? Do i need to post anything for you guys?

item.title: Can't talk?
item.dc:creator: @Cript97 Cript97
item.description:
@Cript97 wrote:

Yes exactly, like i try, test, hello, basic words lol and it just freezes, and well it matches up perfectly?..

Read full topic

item.title: Can't talk?
item.dc:creator: @CoderOops CoderOops
item.description:
@CoderOops wrote:

You mean, normal talk like saying ‘‘hi’’ is also impossible? If it’s so, problem is maybe that, your client does not fit server.

Read full topic

item.title: Can't talk?

item.description:
@Cript97 wrote:

Alright so finally got the client working - sort of, we found the old src files and it runs smoothly on localhost and everything. There’s just this one small problem… When a player types anything and presses enter, the client nulls itself. Making it impossible to test stuff like commands etc. Is there a quick fix for this stuff? Do i need to post anything for you guys?
